title: Physics-Based Epistemology Enhancement Microlearning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic physics concepts and experience using mobile learning tools
context.additional_context: A convergent education course reinterpreting everyday physics phenomena through language learning, aiming to enhance scientific thinking and linguistic expression via explicit/implicit epistemological strategies.

learning_goals: Learners can express observational results of physical phenomena using at least three linguistic metaphors
Learners can analyze everyday life cases according to a scientific epistemology framework with 80% accuracy
After completing a 3-day microlearning module, learners achieve at least 75% goal attainment in project-based assessments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
